topics.body:
It's hard for a story to stay on track till the end.
Most stories written somehow managed to get off track along the way and never return.

Stories that do stay on track are very much praised. Like LoTR or Harry Potter.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

For that we have Families or that fanfic whose name I cant remember from that other guy whose name I cant remember either, but i goes like shuuusshhh and bam and and...
In any case Im afraid that, like Anibal, i made a perpetual oath to hate nyx no matter what, to make her my sworm enemy until the day i die. Sucha was my promise and I have to respect its ramifications.
Have you read Longing? Its very good I tell you.
